title: Igebotz
author: Igebotz
content: The mempool is congested right now ( have two pending transactions) and I need urgent $100 in USDT or Solana.To be paid in BTC when the mempool madness is calm. Will provide you the recipient address in PM.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: You are only making an offer that is beneficial to you.Â  You are asking for help, not an offer of agreement.Better to move your topic to lending board or "currency exchange" section.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: Igebotz on November 10, 2023, 12:20:25 PMThe mempool is congested right now ( have two pending transactions) and I need urgent $100 in USDT or Solana.To be paid in BTC when the mempool madness is calm. Will provide you the recipient address in PM. Hey Igebotz,Please send me your TRC-20 USDT Wallet address in PM.Also, please sign a message from your Bitcoin wallet address.Regards!
